name: levenshtein-edit-distance
description: Levenshtein edit distance. No cruft. Real fast.
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-coveralls: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test.js
scripts.test-travis: npm run test-cli && npm run test-coveralls
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-benchmark && npm run lint-cli && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.install-benchmark: npm install natural fast-levenshtein levenshtein levenshtein-component levenshtein-deltas leven
